General.Name: Sinergi Megah Internusa Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Sinergi Megah Internusa Tbk engages in the hotel and tourism businesses. It operates Lafayette Boutique Hotel that comprises 77 rooms located in Yogyakarta, Indonesia. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Yogyakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: No 409 - North Ring Road, Yogyakarta, Indonesia, 55281
